name: mxpm

1.3.0.name: mxpm
1.3.0.description: Quickly select active paths in your project using a fuzzy finder

projectHomes.title: Project Homes
projectHomes.description: A comma separated list of folders that contain your projects (that is, folders OF projects, not folders FOR projects). If left empty, we'll use the atom projectHome setting if set, otherwise the $PROJECTS env variable if set, otherwise your home directory.

1.0.0.name: mxpm
1.0.0.description: Quickly toggle the active paths in your project using a fuzzy finder

readme:
# mxpm

Quickly toggle the active paths in your project using the fuzzy finder.

### a quick disclaimer

mxpm is my very first atom package, and I'm currently still figuring out how it all works. As such, don't expect much.
On the other hand, I'm pretty attached to this flow (quickly adding and removing projects from my sidebar seems extremely useful!) so odds are that I will continue maintaining this package unless someone else writes something better.
~Max
